Title: Directs a health maintenance organization which denies a claim due to absence of medical necessity to advise insured as to alternative treatment
Summary: Directs a health maintenance organization which denies a claim due to absence of medical necessity to inform the insured as to preferred alternative treatment, or provide the insured with a statement as to the past ineffectiveness of the requested procedure or treatment.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the insurance law, in relation to notice by health maintenance organizations that a request for coverage of a particular treatment is denied
